name: ScovilleScale
0:
”Alexa, open scoville scale”
”Alexa, launch scoville scale”
”Alexa, start scoville scale”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scoville scale
des: That's hot! How hot is it? Scoville Scale let's discover the heat index of your favorite hot sauce and is the only way to join the 'Scoville Society', an exclusive hot sauce Society for new and unique hot sauces !!
